text: Harris campaign suggests Trump avoiding debate because he doesn't want to defend ‘toxic positions’  —  Vice President Harris's campaign on Friday argued that former President Trump shared a handful of “toxic positions” on the debate stage earlier this week and suggested he's avoiding another debate so he doesn't have to defend them.

Harris or Trump?  Once Again, Election Results Could Take a While.  —  More Americans are using mail-in ballots, which take longer to count than those cast in person.  In several battleground states, a winner may not be apparent on Nov. 5.  —  The hosts of election night parties may want to book a room for more than just one night.
